title: His Transmigrated Cannon Fodder Fiancé - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Bickering Couple   Black Belly   Carefree Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Cruel Characters   Devoted Love Interests   Engagement   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Forced into a Relationship   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Parody   Persistent Love Interests   Power Couple   Reincarnation   Royalty   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Seduction   Shameless Protagonist   Siblings   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Tsundere   Twisted Personality   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Yu Fang   予方
description:
“Are the novel Gods punishing me because I left a bad review?!”

Shen Ziqiao woke up from her deep slumber to find herself transmigrated as the character of an ancient novel. To make matters even worse, she was written by the author to be the moronic daughter of the villain, merely a walking cannon fodder.

Yet it doesn’t end there; she has to strive against a reincarnated female lead's revenge! And especially against the major death flag in the plot: getting married to the capital’s fool.

But why does she find this fool’s eyes to be too cunning?>
